0010100001100111 0011110010101011 0 -> sum: 0110010100010010, cout: 0

1111011011000010 1100111011101110 1 -> sum: 1100010110110001, cout: 1

1101110000001110 0100100011100000 1 -> sum: 0010010011101111, cout: 1
